Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

Every time I successfully manage to land on eve, as soon as the craft touches down it will not settle, it begins randomly jumping around until destruction. This happens regardless of landing speed, craft design, and landing apparatus used. It does not decrease over time, and usually becomes more violent. Is this a glitch or have I missed something? If anyone has experience with this or a solution I'd love to hear about it.

Edited December 6, 2019 by BJM1990
